description: Hungry for more power? Windmills can output far more power than puny waterwheels.
Ponder the windmill bearing to learn how to construct one.
You should seek other forms of kenetic energy generation, this and waterwheels are just the simplest ones.

> --/7/Harnessing the wind for power? Hah, it's like a dream I had when I was little, soaring above the clouds. Of course that isn't possible, at least not with our current tech, but this is a step in the right direction. It might even take us to the stars one day./7/--
